title: Solicitor successfully removing access to multiple cases for multiple solicitors in their org (happy path)
specs: U1 - with a Solicitor role in a jurisdiction under an organisation to assign and Unassign a case role to a solicitor within the same organisation
U2 - with a Solicitor role in the same jurisdiction under the same organisation as U1 to be assigned and unassigned to some cases
U3 - with a Solicitor role in the same jurisdiction under the same organisation as U1 to be assigned and unassigned to some cases
is made by U1 and intends to unassign access to C1, C2 and C3 for U2 & U3
